VerifyPageTitle: Planet9 will access your game data after clicking the Verify button for In-Game ID verification.
WarningContents: If you attempt to use any name which does not belong to you, this will be deemed as violating our Terms of Use and could result in your account being banned.
ID_NotAvailable_Warning: This ID is claimed by another account. Please contact us if you wish to claim this ID as your own.
NOT_FOUND_LOCAL_ID: Please launch the game to complete the verification process.
NOT_ENABLE_CONSOLE_MODE: Please set the launch option -condebug in Steam.

NOTIFY_NOT_ENABLE_CONSOLE_MODE: Error: Unable to detect launch option -condebug in Steam.
SubscribePromotion: Subscribe to receive special offers and promotions
NOT_MATCH: The detected game ID # does not match. Please type in your ID and try again.
NOT_MATCH_OVERLAY_TEXT: Current game ID cannot be verified.
AddGameHint: Verify game ID in Planet9 to manage your game stats.
RegisterSuccess: A verification email has been sent, please check your inbox.
DeleteDescription: Delete this Game Info? This action cannot be undone.
UserNamePatternMax: Username must be 16 characters or less.
UserNamePatternMin: Username must be at least 5 characters.
UserNamePatternOther: You may use both letters and numbers, in addition to a limited number of symbols (-, ., and _).
EmailPattern: Please enter a valid email address
AcccoutNotRegistered: This account is not registered on our platform

Dota2Tutorial.Title: Set Dota 2 launch options to track your game stats and monitor improvement.
Dota2Tutorial.Step1: Right-click Dota 2 under the Library in Steam and select Properties.
Dota2Tutorial.Step2: Under the General tab, click Set launch options... button.
Dota2Tutorial.Step4: Close Dota 2's Properties window and launch Dota2.

SessionExpired_Detail: Your session is expired. Please login again.
RecentVersion: This is the most recent version.
UpdateAvailable_Notify: Please go to Planet9 to install the updates now.
UpdateAvailable_NoForceUpdate: A new and improved version of Planet9 is available. Do you want to start the update process now?
UpdateAvailable_ForceUpdate: To begin, go to the "Settings" menu -> About to install the new update later.
